briefTitle: Comparison of Laryngeal Mask Airway (LMA®) and Tracheal Tube in Modified Radical Mastectomy on Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Comparison of Laryngeal Mask Airway (LMA®) and Tracheal Tube for Airway Management in Modified Radical Mastectomy on Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Chinese
* Diagnosed breast cancer
* Undergoing modified radical mastectomy
* Agreed to participate the study with informed contract.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Organic dysfunction
* Long-lasting post-anesthetic care unit(PACU) staying.
